text: Scarlett O'Hara is the main charcater in Margaret Mitchell's book Gone with the Wind with the movie adaptation, and Scarlett by Alexandra Ripley. She is one of the residents of Georgia who had histrionic personality disorder. ==Reference== Category:Characters in written fiction Category:Fictional American people Category:Fictional people with personality disorders Category:Histrionic personality disorder in fiction Category:Movie characters
title: Scarlett O'Hara
